name: Necrotic Orb
description: Project a globe of annihilation that slowly floats forward, dealing 370 Magic Damage every 1 second to nearby enemies.   An ally near the globe can activate the Combustion synergy, causing the orb to explode for 2249 Magic Damage to nearby enemies and restore 3960 Magicka or Stamina to the ally, whichever maximum is higher.
coefDescription: Project a globe of annihilation that slowly floats forward, dealing $1 Magic Damage every 1 second to nearby enemies.   An ally near the globe can activate the Combustion synergy, causing the orb to explode for $2 Magic Damage to nearby enemies and restore 3960 Magicka or Stamina to the ally, whichever maximum is higher.
